attributes.action: Don’t kill innocent dogs, get rid of current government.
attributes.additional_details: Killing a man’s best friend unless actually done something wrong is not the way to practice things, government should be ashamed and stopped from doing this
attributes.background: Take this away no need for it.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action, and we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611

Scrap ban on dog breeds, regulate dog owners and ban euthanasia of healthy dogs: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/652050

Call an immediate general election: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641904
